original_text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus, when I went into Macedonia, that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine,
korean_text: 내가 마게도냐로 갈 때에 너를 권하여 에베소에 머물라 한 것은 어떤 사람들을 명하여 다른 교훈을 가르치지 말며

sentences.original_text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 에베소에 머물도록 간청했을 때,

sentences.original_text: that they teach no other doctrine,
